title: Coleen Rooney parties with WAGS in Manchester until 4am as war with Rebekah Vardy rages on
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Coleen Rooney hit the town for a wild night out in Manchester with two fellow WAGS after her epic showdown with Rebekah Vardy.

Wayne's wife turned heads in a black leather mini-dress as she headed to footballer Wes Brown's 40th birthday party at Vanitas Bar.

She was partying with fellow footballers' wives Tanya Bardsley and Leanne Brown and didn't head home until 4am.

After getting into a taxi, Coleen looked like she was struggling to keep her eyes open as she left the bash.

Coleen, 33, is sure to have needed a night out to blow off some steam following a very dramatic week.

She hit headlines on Wednesday when she publicly accused fellow WAG Rebekah, 37, of leaking stories to the press from her private Instagram .

The post captured the imagination of fans as Coleen detailed how she set a trap to catch the person who had been selling her private information.

(Image: PARFITT - FARRELL / BACKGRID)

(Image: PARFITT/FARRELL / BACKGRID)

Rebekah denied it was her who leaked information from Coleen's private Instagram after the WAG pointed the finger.

Jamie's wife insisted there are many people who have access to her account and could have leaked the information without her knowledge.

Since the spat erupted, numerous celebrities have waded into the row to give their opinion, including another former WAG, Danielle Lloyd.

During an appearance on This Morning, Danielle said: "I wasn’t that shocked. I’ve had run-ins with Rebekah before over similar things.

(Image: PARFITT/FARRELL / BACKGRID)

(Image: Twitter)

"Obviously like everyone else you read it and are like 'oh my gosh', but I wasn’t as shocked seeing who it allegedly was.

"It's definitely come out of Becky's account. I think she did it. Sadly I really do. It's a shame as she probably didn't think she was going to get caught out."

Rebekah later snapped back om Twitter , writing: "Danielle Lloyd making false claims on @thismorning that we have had ‘similar run-ins’ is utter b*****ks."

description: Coleen Rooney hit the town with fellow footballers' wives Tanya Bardsley and Leanne Brown following her public spat with Rebekah Vardy
